job title: Blockchain Data Analyst (Big Data) - Mandarin Speaking
job description:
In this role you will work with Blockchain data and apply your analysis towards trading strategies. You will also be instrumental in the development of a proprietary analytics platform. Relocation is an option for serious candidates only.
Responsibility
    • Responsible for conducting full lifecycle analysis to include requirements, activities, and design. Data analysts will develop analysis and reporting tools such as trading algorithms. They will also monitor performance and quality control plans to identify improvements.
    • Interpret and analyze Blockchain data
    • Leverage existing data analytics tools and skillsets to display blockchain transactional data
    • Help design and implement the architecture needed to house necessary data
    • Partner closely with senior management on strategic projects across the company
Qualification
    • Previous experience working with database frameworks such as SQL or Hadoop and/or programming languages such as Python, C++, Java
    • 3+ years working in a data analytics-focused role
    • Working experience in the Blockchain space is highly preferred- Experience with relevant ML frameworks and libraries (Tensorflow, Caffe2, Theano, CNTK, Torch, NLTK, etc)- Experience in data analysis, programming, blockchain technologies, finance, securities trading, cryptocurrency, or any other related area is a big plus. B.S. or M.S. Computer Science or 4+ years software development experience
